name: Papi Commando Second Blood *Megadrive* Official DEMO
name_original: Papi Commando Second Blood *Megadrive* Official DEMO
description:
Papi (Grandpa) is back and angrier than ever! Help him find his beloved Commostrad. alone or in coop mode with his wife, Mami (Grandma) Commando.

Fight the terrible C++ forces through more than 100 missions across 10 stages until the final battle against the infamous Colonel KassTaGoul (also known as Colonel BreakYaFace) !

Enjoy the official demo with 2 complete Stages and more !

***************************************************************

The Game is now available for pre-order! Help Papi get his Commostrad back from the evil C++ forces ! 

Don't wait to get the full version !!

Check it out : Broke Studio SHOP

Thanks and take Care !

Cheers,

Vetea
